EchoGuard Tactical SOS Controller

EchoGuard utilizes this hardware-level service to monitor system-wide physical key events. This low-level hook enables the detection of a rapid power button sequence (5 presses within a 2-second window) to trigger a covert SOS dispatch even when the screen is powered off or locked. This service is strictly utilized for hardware-based safety triggers; it does not log keystrokes, collect sensitive personal data, or transmit user behavioral patterns to any external servers.

EchoGuard requires high-accuracy GPS coordinates to provide first responders and your emergency contacts with your precise live location during a distress event.
Background location access is essential for the \'Safe Walk\' and \'Dead Man\'s Switch\' features to maintain a safety trail while your device is locked or in your pocket.
